msbt.message: To you, you wonderful stranger you,
To someone, somewhere, sometime,
Dear I-don't-know-who,
To a sharp scavenger,
To lucky you,
So I was strollin' along the beach, listening to the waves roll in, when suddenly I had this rad DIY idea.
It turns out great DIY ideas can hit at really inconvenient times. Like juuuuust as I'm falling asleep.
I was out gardening, elbow deep in dirt and face bumping my flowers, when I got this way-cool DIY idea.
I was reading a letter I got from my dad back home, and something he wrote gave me a solid DIY idea.
I was out doing... whatever I like to do (none of your business and who cares?) and got this cool DIY idea.
I was gonna keep it to myself, but it's so good I just had to share.
Then I had a crazy idea for sharing that recipe, and here we are.
I wrote the recipe down as quick as I could in case I forgot it.
And then I thought, where's the fun in keeping the recipe to myself.
I figured SOMEBODY out there would wanna try building it.
Well, from here it's all you!
So get to it! Build build build!
And with that... Good luck!
You've got this. I believe in you!
I promise it might not explode.
Wicked Genius
Taking cover,
Secret DIY pen pal
Clever crafter
And VANISH! â€“

I came up with a rockin' recipe for a DIY mirror a bit ago and thought you'd wanna check it out. It's easy to make, plus you can check out your hair or whatever with it. Give it a whirl and see what you think!
